content:
TEI Tools SIG Matthew Zimmerman 12th February 2004

New text from Serge Heiden updated link to new mailing list redid lost change from 2007-09-20: corrected list email address and link to list archive added new p about meeting in college park Converted to P5 added link to list archives added new p about meeting in victoria, added back former name of SIG changed name of SIG where mentioned, from "Presentation" to "Tools" added new div about discussion in nancy fixed 2 typos, added 2 missing tags

The goal of the TEI Special Interest Group on Tools (formerly "Presentation") is to bring together members who wish to share information about XML-TEI compatible tools. This covers: editing tools to encode texts and corpora conversion and preprocessing tools transformation and presentation languages such as XSLT querying tools such as native XML databases publishing and delivery tools analysis tools like Xaira, Philologic, etc.

The main channel of information for the SIG is the TEI WIKI.

The SIG runs a mailing list on this topic. Click here to join.

For further information about the Tools SIG, please contact Serge Heiden.
